existing_features.title: Remove the ZIP build export feature from the UI by deleting the "Build Export" section in the Diagnostics bar, including the download button, progress text, and the deployment instructions that reference downloading/extracting a ZIP.

Remove the underlying ZIP export implementation so the frontend no longer generates or downloads ZIP files, including removing the usage of exportFrontendBuild/downloadBlob and any ZIP writer logic that is only used for this export.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove the zip file from the build/deployment output

projectName: Remove ZIP build export from the app
